name: Bus Driver 2d Experience Rush
description:
You get a windows, mac, linux builds, android build and you get the source project. Requires construct 2 personal licensees at the very least.

This also has a additional licensees applied to it, which makes it non-commercial to distribute the source code after purchasing.
If you want to make a commercially licensed game you will need to contact me about it. This source code is to allow you to modify the game, and redistribute those modifications.

Bus driver 2d experience rush is a arcade style game where you deal with traffic, and have to repair and re-fuel up your bus.

All while trying to complete challenges to earn points to improve your bus, or get the high score.

You can also create your own bus in this games built in "create a bus" menu.

This game was created using construct 2, and has over 700 events.
With touch support, controller, mouse & keyboard.

Music By: Armando Cornaglia
